body.name: Galanz Personal Air Purifiers for Bedroom, H13 True HEPA Air Filter with Fragrance Sponge, 3-Stage Filtration for 99.99% Smoke, Dust, Odors, Mold, Desktop Air Cleaner for Pets, Leather Handle, White
body.stockDetail: Only 11 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Sunday, February 18. Order within 16 hrs 23 mins
features: HIGH PERFORMANCE - Designed with advanced nano-molecular filtration technology and 360° overall air suction, the HEPA filter captures 99.99% of airborne particles 0.3 microns in size; We recommend replacing the filter every 2200 hours or 6 months with a Galanz replacement filter, ASIN B0BTZTVYCM, for best results

3-STAGE FILTRATION - This high efficiency replacement filter uses a 360° multi-layered defense system - high grade activated carbon, H13 true HEPA filter, and primary filtration - to help free from dust, pet dander, fiber, pollen, viruses, pollution, smoke etc.
ESSENTIAL OIL DIFFUSER - By adding essential oil to the aromatherapy pad, this air purifier becomes an essential oil diffuse adding extra freshness to the air

PORTABLE DESIGN WITH ADJUSTABLE SPEEDS - The durable leather handle makes it easy to transport from room to room; Includes 3 different fan speeds to meet your needs - from subtle white noise to virtually silent

IDEAL FOR SMALL SPACES - CARB & Energy Star certified, it purifies 36.5 ft² space 1x per hour, 87.5 ft² 2x per hour, and 175.2 ft² 5x per hour; Measuring 6.7" W x 6.7" D x 10.2" H, it is ideal for desktops, small rooms, bathrooms, and kitchens
body.description: Product Features: Room Coverage up to 87.5 sq ft Layered Filtration: Pre-Filer, H13 True HEPA, Carbon 360 Filtration Essential Oil Diffuser 3 Fan Speeds Ozone Free Filter Replacement Reminder Leather Handle Specifications: Power Consumption: Max-5.8w High-3.25w Low-1.75w Color: White Product Dimension: 6.7*6.7*10.2 (W*D*H, inches) Power Cord Plug Type: DC 5V Type C Power Source: 5V Warranty: 1 Year Limited Warranty

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: COMPACT DESIGN Compact and cute design makes it easily fit your desktop and any space. 6.7 x 6.7 x 10.2 (W x D x H, inches) PORTABLE DESIGN The durable leather handle makes Galanz air purifiers easier to move from room to room. QUIET USE Whisper-level noise as low as 35dB, ensure your sleep peacefully with fresh, clean air filtered throughout the night. AROMA DESIGN Aroma pad on the top of Galanz air cleaners allows to add essential oil and turn it into an essential oil diffuser, adding a pleasant smell to the air and comfort your nerve while working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very stylish and well packaged product
reviews.reviewText: Highest fan is a bit noisy but I'm glad that It works on usb c so I can use it anywhere, the only problem is finding a supplier that sells H13 filters compatible with this model

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars NO Replacement Filters
reviews.reviewText: Get ready for this electronic unit to be disposable. It has been impossible to find replacement filters so in a few months this unit is useless. Sad because it is a decent unit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars It’s big, but a fantastic air purifier with super quite operation, functionality and performance.
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. The Pro Large air purifier by Galanz is a wonderfully modern and effective purifier. With its super quite auto mode and highly effective purification, you should definitely consider this one. Here are some of the things I’ve learned while owning it and things to consider before buying.I. Features – It can adapt to changing air qualities on the fly. The auto mode, and HEPA filter combine to really clean the air out. The sleep mode is great if you are using it in your bedroom, you won’t even know it’s on and it turns the lights out. Only downside is I forget sometimes that it’s on and leave it on all day, while I’m gone. The best feature is the auto mode, that will go high if needed, but once the air quality is under control, it’s so quite you won’t even hear it usually. It also has a light on the top with different colors to represent different air qualities in the room.II. Quality – It feels like it’s made out of good quality materials, that I would think will last a long time. The leather lift handle is a nice touch and look good, but the white plastic exterior doesn’t live up to the price tag.III. Size – This thing is big at 20in. tall, but it also comes with big performance to match.Overall, despite the size of this purifier it’s worth it. I own many purifiers and this one goes in my bedroom, because of the features and performance. I just put it on auto mode and it takes care of the rest quietly and efficiently, always providing me fresh, clean, great smelling air. I highly recommend this one, unless the size is an issue for your application. So far everything has works as they intended, but if I ever start to have problems with it, I’ll be sure to update this review.If you’d find it helpful to see a visual inspection of this product, I recommend you watch my included video in full screen. They say a picture is worth a 1000 words, well it’s a video!You can trust that this review is simply my honest opinion that is attempting to provide you with helpful insight that I wish I had before I picked this product. Hopefully it was helpful in your decision.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good for only a few months
reviews.reviewText: I’ve had the small room air purifier for 3 months and it was working great until a beeping noise kept alarming about every 2 minutes. I replaced the filter as I’ve read this can be a notifier that it’s time to replace the filter, but the beeping is still occurring. I wish I could continue to use this because it is great white noise for sleep and it works well for the price, but the beeping is too annoying for me.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for bedroom or home office - and very quiet!
reviews.reviewText: I’ve mainly known Galanz for their stylish refrigerators and microwaves and was not surprised to see that their personal air purifier was also very attractive. It looks so modern and beautiful - especially with the carrying handle. While the handle does not look like real leather, it does seem like it is durable. I’m also very grateful that it does not light up with blue, purple or other obnoxious lights like some other air purifiers. I like my appliances discreet. All the better to blend in with my decor.I’m very impressed by just how quiet this Galanz air purifier is. I have another large air purifier (for 700 square foot rooms) that is wonderful but louder. I barely even notice the Galanz is in the room and running most of the time, and am almost surprised to see it there. That’s how quiet it is. It’s great for bedrooms, for this reason.Set up is really easy and took only a few minutes. You just have to unscrew the air purifier, unwrap the filter, and put it back in.You also have the option to add your own scent to the aromatherapy pad in the scent chamber. However, this was perhaps the least impressive feature to me. Perhaps I have become spoiled by my aromatherapy diffuser but I didn’t feel that the scent chamber made much of a discernible difference. I added what must have been 15 to 18 drops of Cedarwood essential oil and neither my husband nor I could smell anything (we started with 8 drops and kept adding more and more, but nothing made a difference). We felt that we wasted our essential oil in the end.So far, the Galanz air purifier seems to work well for our bedroom. I have a lot of allergies (animal dander, dust, tree/grass/flower/weed pollen, etc.) as well as asthma. Both my allergies and asthma have been doing well with the Galanz personal air purifier in our bedroom and our larger air purifier in our living room. This is with two cats in our household as well.Our bedroom also seems to smell better because the air purifier seems to neutralize stale smells.I’ll update if anything changes but so far, I would recommend this as a personal air purifier.
